div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 29 Tegea environs, Arcadia, c. 1875 (1080) Burial: c. 430-400 B.C. (T) Contents: AR Arcadia (federal):"many" triob. Mantineia: 2 triob. (bear/dolphin, bear/ acorn) "some" ob. (acorn/M) Disposition: priv. coll. Greece de Longp√©rier, RN 1874-7, p. 167
